features: ✔️PRESSURE RELIEF - The seat cushion for lower back pain relief is ergonomically designed to evenly distribute your weight to form a pressure-free point, Gel Seat Cushion improve blood circulation of the lower limbs to a greater extent, seat cushion for tailbone pain relief,comfortable with lumbar strain, sciatica, and degenerative disc disease caused by long sitting.

✔️SOFT & BREATHABLE - The office chair seat cushion is very soft and hard to deform. Compared with memory foam seat cushion, our bleacher-cushion-seat-pad are designed with gel material and a breathable honeycomb structure, chair cushions built-in free-flowing air channel prevents sweaty buttocks and maintains comfortable heat dissipation, good as Car Seat, Stadium Seat Cushion and desk chair cushion.

✔️LARGE & THICK - The coccyx cushion measures 16.15 x 15.75 x 1.6 inches, has a double-layer design, tailbone pain relief cushion is thicker and larger than other gaming chair cushion, better matches your chair or car seat, and is more comfortable for long sitting.

✔️CLEAN & NON-SLIP - This gel cushion is made of high-quality material and comes with a black machine washable non-slip cover. The zipper design and removable seat cover are easy to clean, giving you a better experience.

✔️WIDELY USED & PERFECT GIFT - This pressure relief seat cushion is suitable for office chairs, home, travel, car seats, wheelchairs and all kinds of hard seats, suitable as a gift for family, friends and colleagues. Your complete satisfaction is our top priority.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cushy and supportive
reviews.reviewText: Got this cushion for my car and am thoroughly enjoying it when I drive. It seems quite well made, has a washable cover and provides REAL support and comfort for me and my lower back issues. I’ve tried a couple others and they either pancaked within a couple uses or were absolute garbage from the get-go but this one is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a squishy comfy pillow with support this isn’t it. It does offer great support but it is much more firm than I expected. I originally wanted something more cushy but this has grown on me. It is comfortable and can really change an old chair. It is nice that the cover is removable and washable. Glad I got this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gel Cushion Delivers Comfort and Stability
reviews.reviewText: Ditch the pillow, embrace the gel! This cushion provided a welcome upgrade over my old standby. No more slipping and sliding, just cool, comfortable support. Early days, but so far, so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Could be much more better....
reviews.reviewText: Not worth the moneyI purchased this cushion with high hopes of it providing relief from my back pain. Unfortunately, it did not live up to my expectations. The cushion is too firm and uncomfortable to sit on for long periods of time. I also found that it did not provide the pressure relief that it claimed to offer. I would not recommend this product to anyone looking for a comfortable and supportive seat cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cushion because I was having an issue and needed some support. This cushion did not disappoint. It is firm and soft at the same time. I will but another one if anything ever happens to this one. {we have cats) Great Purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit too small …..
reviews.reviewText: First, please ignore the condition of my husband’s office chair! :) It’s like a favorite, old ratty t-shirt at this point!I gave this seat cushion 3 stars because it’s made well and to me, it’s not uncomfortable, although it does feel weird and you need to get used to it - but it’s too small. Because it’s too small it hits your legs in weird ways or if you have it the other direction, it hits your sides strange, which hurts the comfort.If it was a bit bigger, it would be more comfortable. The height, about an inch, was perfect for my needs!I have a bad back and I do feel more supported sitting on it. It’s firm but not hard. It’s a honeycomb sort of silicone, the listing is pretty accurate on that.I’m 5’2, 108 lbs. My husband sat on it who is 5’10”, 190 lbs and he actually found it a bit more comfortable than me, maybe his weight squishes it down more.I included another pad that was advertised similarly on Amazon and you can see the difference in size. I shouldn’t have been lazy and measured. The gray one is too tall for me and my husband stole it for his actual office chair, that has height adjustment (terrible chair pics!). It was too tall for this chair I use to puzzle. I will try to break this one in. I’m also not on it 8 hours a day.I also included pics on a pretty small cheap Staples mesh chair so you could get an idea.If this was the same size as the other to fit a standard office chair seat, I would have rated it higher. I received this through Vine for my honest review. I also picked up a seat cushion for my son at college and he loves it. I’m just having less luck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Versatile
reviews.reviewText: The Gel Seat Cushion is a game-changer! It keeps me cool and comfortable during long hours at my desk or in the car. Versatile, supportive, and easy to clean. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Flattens down to nothing!
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn’t recommend this product. Better off getting a memory foam chair cushion. And, I was charged for shipping it back to Amazon
